lead_paragraph: A Denver-area Boy Scout troop made up almost entirely of refugees provides a safe haven where its members can be themselves, troop leaders say.
snippet: A Denver-area Boy Scout troop made up almost entirely of refugees provides a safe haven where its members can be themselves, troop leaders say....

headline.main: AP PHOTOS: Refugee Boy Scouts Learn, Bond on Camping Trips
headline.print_headline: AP PHOTOS: Refugee Boy Scouts Learn, Bond on Camping Trips
